sentences.en: Apollo promptly transformed his depraved pair of ears into those of an ass.
sentences.cn: 阿波罗当场把他那对不辨雅俗的耳朵变成了一对驴耳朵.

sentences.en: By most accounts Meiwes was a depraved and pathetic individual from Roteburg, Germany.
sentences.cn: 迈韦斯, 德国罗滕堡人,据说是个堕落的可怜虫.

sentences.en: If not depraved by early debauchery, his life would have been fit for better things.
sentences.cn: 要不是早年放荡堕落, 他一生也会做出比较出色的事情的.

sentences.en: In 1766 he excommunicated the village for its "depraved diversion."
sentences.cn: 1766年，他以“堕落地享乐”为由将那个村庄逐出教会。

sentences.en: In fact, smoky dressing can make you very sexual depraved to some degree.
sentences.cn: 其实,颓废,不是主流, 烟熏妆依然可以相当的性感.

sentences.en: Memory, the punishment from god, makes depraved, makes you remorseful, makes you agonized.
sentences.cn: 记忆是上帝对人类的惩罚, 它让人堕落, 让人愧疚, 让人痛苦不堪.

sentences.en: Result: You perform depraved acts of self - humiliation and are enthusiastically accepted into the fold.
sentences.cn: 结果: 你做了一些丢脸的堕落行为,该兄弟会热烈欢迎你入会.

sentences.en: This is the work of a depraved mind.
Wanted to get rid of those depraved image and condition.
sentences.cn: 想要一扫过去有点颓废的状态和形象罗.

sentences.en: Wiht depraved color. the more I love you the more I feel cold.
sentences.cn: 逐渐颓唐的颜色, 越来越爱你越来越寒冷.

sentences.en: You must either be mad or utterly depraved and wicked.
sentences.cn: 你一定是疯了,要不就是中了邪,鬼迷心窍.

trans.tran_cn: 堕落( deprave的过去式和过去分词 )
